SEARCH
Package be.brahms.rent_serve.controllers

Class MaterialController

java.lang.Object
be.brahms.rent_serve.controllers.MaterialController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/material/") public class MaterialController extends Object
This controller manages materials Display the list of materials Get by identifier Create a new material Edit a material Delete a material List a list of material by category

  • Method Details

    • getMaterials

      @GetMapping("list") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MEMBER\', \'MODERATOR\', \'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<MaterialDto>>> getMaterials()
      Get all material from the database This method returns a list of all materials Each material is converted to a MaterialDto Each materialDto is wrapped inside an EntityModel with HATEOAS links.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a list of material model

    • getMaterial

      @GetMapping("{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MEMBER\', \'MODERATOR\', \'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<MaterialByIdDto>> getMaterial(@PathVariable long id)
      Get a material by his identifier This method return a material Each material is converted to a MaterialByIdDto Each MaterialByIdDto is wrapped inside an EntityModel with HATEOAS links
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier from material
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with some data from material

    • createMaterial

      @PostMapping("new") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MEMBER\', \'MODERATOR\', \'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<MaterialDto>> createMaterial(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid MaterialForm form)
      Create a new material This method create a new material Each material is converted to a MaterialDto Each MaterialDto is wrapped inside an EntityModel with HATEOAS links
      Parameters:
      form - use the formModel to create a new material
      Returns:
      the name with the new name

    • updateMaterial

      @PutMapping("{id}/edit") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MODERATOR\', \'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<MaterialByIdDto>> updateMaterial(@PathVariable long id, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid MaterialForm form)
      Update the material by his identifier

      This method allows to edit a material. Check if the category exist and check if the name is not null before to update

      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of material
      form - the form to edit material
      Returns:
      a new name of material after edited

    • deleteMaterial

      @DeleteMapping("{id}/delete") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<MaterialDto>> deleteMaterial(@PathVariable long id)
      Delete material

      This method delete a material Each MaerialDto is wrapped inside an EntityModel with HATEOAS links.

      Parameters:
      id - The identifier
      Returns:
      an delete material

    • getMaterialByNameCategory

      @GetMapping("/category/{nameCategory}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MEMBER\', \'MODERATOR\', \'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<MaterialDto>>> getMaterialByNameCategory(@PathVariable String nameCategory)
      Get list of material by name of category

      This method make a list of material display a list only grouped by name of category

      Parameters:
      nameCategory - The name of category
      Returns:
      a list of materials

    • getMaterialByNameMaterial

      @GetMapping("/search/{nameMaterial}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'MEMBER\', \'MODERATOR\', \'ADMIN\')") public ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<MaterialDto>>> getMaterialByNameMaterial(@PathVariable String nameMaterial)
      Get list of material by name of material

      This method make a list of material display a list of material by name or display only one material by searched

      Parameters:
      nameMaterial - The name of material
      Returns:
      a list of material or only one material
